item.title: CVE-2024-31383|2024-04-15T10:14:47.899Z -- pagelayer -- popularfx
item.description: Cross-Site Request Forgery (CSRF) vulnerability in Pagelayer PopularFX.This issue affects PopularFX: from n/a through 1.2.4.
